summary.p: 6 fol. on parchment; Shelfmark: Marcel 58; Qurʾānic Text: Q 82:5-85:7; 10 lines per page; Dimensions: 310 x 240mm; Script style: kūfī D.Va.
The fragments Marcel 61 (NLR) and Arabe 325 (d) (BNF) belong to the same manuscript.

This entry was created on the basis of the information made available by Valery V. Polosin (1939-2014), without use of manuscript images. Therefore, the exact distribution of the Qurʾānic passages across the manuscript pages is unknown to us, and all the passages are shown as belonging to fol. 1. The catalogue entry by Polosin contains the following information:
"Marcel 58
6 fol. 240×310 mm (1.292). Support: parchment of average thickness, transparent, of yellowish color, rigid, smooth. Writing material: brown ink.
Collation: one incomplete quire; at present all the sheets are sigletons.
I: H1F / F2H F3H F4H F5H F6H.
Text layout: 147×240 mm (1.6), 10 lines. Ruling: absent. Script: D Va. Diacritics: diagonal dashes in the same ink as the main text. Vocalization: round red dots.

Verse markers: for groups of five verses – golden letter ﻪ (hā); for groups of ten verses –medallions in the text line (type 3.B.I) in gold and colors, with the inscribed verse numbers signified by letters according to the abjad system (л. 1r, 3v, 4r).

Headings of surahs are written in gold, with golden palmettos on the outer margin: surah 83 – المطففون ثلثون وست (fol. 1v); surah 84 – انشقت عشرون وخمس (fol. 4v); surah 85 – البروج عشرون واثنان (؟) (fol. 6v).

Inscriptions: numbers of surahs and verses inscribed in pencil on the upper margins of all sheets in Roman and Arabic letters; verse numbers are also marked in ink in the text; the word “Variante” inscribed on the lower margin of fol. 4v.

Defects: pages have darkened and deteriorated along the spine with partial loss of text; tears parchment damaged by aggressive ink on fol.л. 2, 4 and 6; on some pages the text from the opposite page has inmripted; ink peeling off on the flesh side of some sheets..
Old accession numbers: B. 36 (according to Langlois’ inventory).
Contents:
Fol. 1r–1v. Surah 82, verses 5(5)–19(19)*. Incipit: [قدمت و] اخرت .
Fol. 1v–4v. Surah 83.
Fol. 4v–6v. Surah 84.
Fol. 6v. Surah 85, verses 1(1)–7(7). Explicit: ما يفعلون [بالمؤمنين شهود] .
Other fragments of the same manuscript: Marcel 61 (NLR), Arabe 325d, f (BNF)."
Olga Yastrebova has translated and sometimes corrected the notes of V. Polosin. Corrected passages are marked with ОЯ (O.Ya).
